tool_description: Unoffical API for Finviz screener application.
name: Finviz Screener
title: Finviz Screener

api_list.name: Get Table
api_list.description: Fetch the table of screener. You can use any values from API `/params` to control your screener.

api_list.name: Get Parameters
api_list.description:
Get Finviz Screener Parameters:
1. Sorters, decide how to sort result
2. Signals, finviz defined signal filter
3. Filters, all available filters of finviz screener
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finviz-screener.p.rapidapi.com/params"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finviz-screener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finviz-screener.p.rapidapi.com/params"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finviz-screener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
